import React, { useState } from 'react' import { faLongArrowAltLeft } from '@fortawesome/fontawesome-free-solid' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { useLocation } from 'wouter' import { Carousel } from 'react-responsive-carousel'; import { useMoviePopular } from '../../hooks/useMoviePopular'; import './index.css' export default function Movies() { const [, pushLocation] = useLocation() const parameter = useMoviePopular() const handleClick = () => { pushLocation('/') } return

HOME

{parameter.loading === true ?
: parameter.results.map(element => { return
{element.release_date}
{element.vote_average} / 10
33 ? "title large text-shadow w-full py-6" : "title extralarge text-shadow w-full py-6"}> {element.title}
}) }

peliculas de la semana

}
